problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): I was surprised when there were two repair specialists, Zahra Shakir and Alejandra Munoz, who showed up to change the lightbulbs in my bedroom. It isn't a two person job.
Question: Who did the work?
ans0: Zahra Shakir
ans1: Can't answer
ans2: Alejandra Munoz
